pageProduct.name: Alkira Detoxifying Purifying Facial Masque 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Australian Clays + Clarifying Botanicals + Complexion Correcting Natives. Delivering triple duty beauty, this mask will absorb toxins and impurities and reenergise the appearance of a tired and dehydrated complexion.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Australian native complex of Lilly Pilly and Desert Lime delivering vitamin C and EFA rich Kangaroo Paw • Australian clays for a deep clean and to minimise pores • Flavone Glycosides and Ferulic Acid - potent antioxidants to fight free radical damage and protect skin • Naturally occurring natives rich in vitamin C and AHA’s to reveal clear skin • Essential fatty acids and phytonutrients to strengthen the skin’s barrier and lock in moisture • Clarifying Nettle and Horsetail to combat redness • Hydrating Shea, Jojoba and Avocado to leave skin soft post deep cleanse

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Kaolin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Bentonite, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Syzygium Leuhmannii (Lilly Pilly) Fruit Extract, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Anigozanthos Flavidus (Kangaroo Paw) Flower/Leaf Extract, Arctium Lappa (Burdock) Root Extract, Vanillin, Water (Aqua), Xanthan Gum, Quartz, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*Linalool*Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499) *Allergens

Directions

Apply to damp face and neck. Relax and allow to penetrate for 15 minutes. Rinse off with warm water and wash cloth
